exceptions.OBJ_NOT_FOUND: Resource not found in the system.

intro.presentation: My name is Loris and I am a web designer and developer
intro.description: I specialize in designing and developing web and mobile applications, with the goal of optimizing the experience for users who use my products daily to achieve their goals.

experience.title: Experience is not lacking
experience.description: Thanks to late-night programming sessions with coffee and the solid theoretical foundation acquired through academic studies, I strive to create useful and comfortable products for users.

work.title: Academic and Work Experiences
work.mta1Desc: I started my career as an intern, working on a project in Angular 8. During the two years in which I combined study and work, I also developed applications in Vue 2/3 and Flutter.
work.mta2Desc: After obtaining my master's degree in Multimedia Systems and Interaction Design, I undertook the design of various management systems and mobile applications, mainly developed with Angular 15/16/17/18 and Flutter.
work.webCms1Desc: During my early years in high school, I created several websites primarily using WordPress and, in one case, Prestashop. I handled the entire development process, from template selection to the deployment of web portals, supporting clients in achieving their goals.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Do you have a project in mind?
contact.description2: Let's talk about it over a cup of coffee!

genericWarning: Attention, the operation cannot be completed

errors.alpha: The field {{field}} can only contain alphabetic characters
errors.alpha_num: The field {{field}} can only contain alphanumeric characters
errors.alpha_dash: The field {{field}} can contain alphanumeric characters as well as hyphens and underscores
errors.alpha_spaces: The field {{field}} can contain only alphanumeric characters as well as spaces
errors.between: The field {{field}} must be between {{min}} and {{max}}
errors.digits: The field {{field}} must be numeric and contain exactly {{length}} digits
errors.email: The field {{field}} must be a valid email address
errors.excluded: The field {{field}} must have a valid value
errors.ext: The field {{field}} must be a valid file
errors.image: The field {{field}} must be an image
errors.integer: The field {{field}} must be a number
errors.length: The length of the field {{field}} must be {{length}}
errors.max_value: The field {{field}} must be less than or equal to {{max}}
errors.maxDate: The field {{field}} must be a date on or before {{max}}
errors.max: The field {{field}} cannot be longer than {{length}} characters
errors.mimes: The field {{field}} must be a valid file type
errors.min_value: The field {{field}} must be greater than or equal to {{min}}
errors.min: The field {{field}} must have at least {{length}} characters
errors.numeric: The field {{field}} can only contain numeric characters
errors.one_of: The field {{field}} must have a valid value
errors.regex: The field {{field}} has an invalid format
errors.regexWithSuggestion: The field {{field}} has an invalid format (e.g., {{suggestion}})
errors.size: The field {{field}} must be less than {{size}}KB
errors.generic: There is an error in the field {{field}}
errors.dateIsBefore: The date in the field {{field}} cannot be before the field {{comparisonField}}
errors.maxlength: The field {{field}} has a maximum length of {{num}} characters
errors.minlength: The field {{field}} has a minimum length of {{num}} characters
errors.passwordWeak: The password must contain at least 8 characters, at least one number, and at least one letter
